comments:
when attempting to change a java->editor->syntax coloring preference by clicking
on the ok button an error is thrown. this causes the whole preferences dialog is
lock up. when this occurs the only way to close eclipse is via the task manager.

to reproduce simply start a fresh 3.1M5a build,
select windows->preferences,
select java->editor->syntax coliring,
change a property,
click ok.
I'm not seeing this error.  What error is being thrown?  Is there anything of note in your log?

The error in my log flie is:
